各不相同.definition: to be quite varied; each one is different

各人自掃門前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜.pinyin: ge4 ren2 zi4 sao3 men2 qian2 xue3 , mo4 guan3 ta1 jia1 wa3 shang4 shuang1
各人自掃門前雪，莫管他家瓦上霜.definition: sweep the snow from your own door step, don't worry about the frost on your neighbor's roof (idiom)

各位.definition: everybody; all (guests, colleagues etc); all of you

各個.definition: every; various; separately, one by one

各別.definition: distinct; different; separately; individually; unusual; novel; (pejorative) eccentric; bizarre

各國.definition: each country; every country; various countries

各地.definition: in all parts of (a country); various regions

各執一詞.definition: each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf

各執己見.definition: each sticks to his own view (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf

各執所見.definition: each sticks to his own view

各奔前程.definition: each goes his own way (idiom); each person has his own life to lead

各奔東西.definition: to go separate ways (idiom); to part ways with sb; Taiwan pr. [ge4 ben1 dong1 xi1]

各就各位.definition: (of the people in a group) to get into position (idiom); (athletics) On your mark!

各得其所.definition: (idiom) each in the correct place; each is provided for

各打五十大板.pinyin: ge4 da3 wu3 shi2 da4 ban3
各打五十大板.definition: lit. to give each one a flogging of fifty strokes (idiom); fig. to punish the guilty and the innocent alike; to put the blame on both parties

各拉丹冬山.definition: Mount Geladaindong or Geladandong in Qinghai (6621 m), the main peak of the Tanggula mountain range 唐古拉山脈|唐古拉山脉[Tang2 gu3 la1 Shan1 mai4]

各拉丹冬峰.definition: Mount Geladaindong or Geladandong in Qinghai (6621 m), the main peak of the Tanggula mountain range 唐古拉山脈|唐古拉山脉[Tang2 gu3 la1 Shan1 mai4]

各持己見.definition: each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout

各方.definition: all parties (in a dispute etc); all sides; all directions

各族人民.definition: people of all ethnic groups; the peoples (of a nation)

各有所好.definition: everyone has their likes and dislikes (idiom)

各界.definition: all walks of life; all social circles

各異.definition: all different; each unto his own

各盡所能.definition: each does his utmost (idiom); from each according to his means

各種.definition: every kind of; all kinds of; various

各自為政.definition: to do things each in one's own way

各行其是.definition: each one does what he thinks is right (idiom); each goes his own way

各行各業.definition: every trade; all professions; all walks of life
